actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend section 411 of the Higher Education Act of 1965 with regard to determinations of independent student status, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 with regard to determinations of independent student status for purposes of basic educational opportunity grants under such Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 411 of the Higher Education Act of 1965 with regard to determinations of independent student status, and for other purposes.
